TopicTitle: how are people clicking on things in videos to do stuff?

Articles.Content:
in videos people will right click on things do do stuff. how do i do this?

P.S. i am using a mac

You said it yourself, right click on it.

Apple are horrible for ergonomic consistency so there are several different right click systems from just the last few years.

ctrl+left click may work.

If you've got a mighty mouse you can enable the right click in system preferences

The touchpads seem to vary between using a lower corner and clicking with two fingers touching it.

I've no idea whether the magic mouse follows the previous mouse or the touchpads, try all four ways.
thanks ill try the two finger click later but thank you so much, i was running out of action groups.
